mapper.select: SELECT draft_document_code AS draftDocumentCode, draft_document_status AS draftDocumentStatus, draft_document_member_name AS draftDocumentMemberName, draft_document_file_save_name AS draftDocumentFileSaveName, document_opinion_count AS documentOpinionCount, document_attatch_file_count AS documentAttatchFileCount, draft_document_date AS draftDocumentDate FROM draft_document WHERE draft_document_member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY draft_document_date DESC
